name: Rocky Patel Mulligans - Caddy’s Choice - Robusto
additionalNotes: Cigar industry maverick Rocky Patel has built an iconic reputation by creating an abundance of top-rated, bestselling cigars over the years. Rocky’s prolific output and sincere penchant for perfection occasionally result in a cigar release that simply doesn’t fit into the esteemed Rocky Patel portfolio. To accommodate Rocky’s relentless blending endeavors, the Rocky Patel Mulligans franchise was developed as a channel to bring many of Rocky’s lesser-known, but equally prized cigars to market. The Mulligans brand has been purchased and enjoyed by over 500,000 cigar lovers worldwide who unanimously agree that every blend smokes like a dream come true.
